conversation.content: I've been trying to reach someone for forty minutes. Your automated system keeps sending me in circles with no option for a representative.
I sincerely apologize for that frustrating experience. Let me note your account details and ensure we address both your original concern and this system issue. May I start with your account number?
It's 847-293-5510. I need to update billing information before tomorrow's automatic payment processes.
Thank you. I've located account 847-293-5510 and I can see your payment is scheduled for tomorrow at 12:01 AM Eastern. Let me update your billing information right now to prevent any issues.
Perfect. The new card number ends in 4782 and expires March 2027.
Certainly. I'll need the complete card number to process this update securely. Our system will automatically encrypt it using AES-256 protocol for your protection.
The full number is 4532-8901-6745-4782. Should I also provide the security code?
Yes, please provide the three-digit CVV code. I'll also need to verify the billing ZIP code associated with this payment method to complete the update in our system.
The CVV is 892 and the billing ZIP code is 60614.
Excellent. I've successfully updated your payment method ending in 4782 with expiration 03/27. Your scheduled payment of $89.95 will process using this new card tomorrow as planned.
Thank you. Can you also document the phone menu issue? This happens every time I call.
Absolutely.
How long has this been a known issue? Other customers must be experiencing this.
I'm documenting this in ticket INC-7829341 for our technical team. We've received similar reports over the past 72 hours, and I can confirm a system update is scheduled for deployment this weekend.
That's good to hear. Will customers be notified when it's fixed?
Yes, we'll send notification to all affected customers via email once the fix is verified. I'm also adding priority code P2-URGENT to your specific case to ensure you receive direct confirmation.
I appreciate that. One more thingâ€”is there a direct number I can use to bypass the menu system?
Certainly. For future assistance, you can use our priority support line at 1-888-527-9043 extension 7721. This bypasses the main menu entirely and connects you directly to our tier-two support team.
That's exactly what I needed. Thank you for resolving both issues so efficiently.
You're very welcome. I've emailed confirmation of your payment method update and the priority support number to your address on file. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

scenario: frustrated about circular phone menu with no human option
